class.name: PlannerBeliefManager
class.brief_description: Belief Manager for the Belief-Based Ego Architecture.
class.description:
Handles belief formation, updating, and confidence management across personas. Manages the persona registry and enforces information asymmetry (personas cannot directly access each other's internal states).
The belief manager maintains a registry of all personas and provides methods to: - Register and manage personas - Retrieve ego-centric beliefs about other personas - Process observations and communications for belief updates - Enforce information asymmetry

method.name: get_beliefs_about
method.description: Get ego-centric beliefs that one persona has about another.

method.name: get_persona
method.description: Get a registered persona by ID.

method.name: get_planner_state
method.description: Attempt to get planner state for a persona. Returns an error dictionary to enforce information asymmetry (personas cannot directly access each other's internal states).

method.name: has_persona
method.description: Check if a persona is registered.

method.name: process_communication_for_persona
method.description: Process communication for a specific persona to update their beliefs.

method.name: process_observation_for_persona
method.description: Process an observation for a specific persona to update their beliefs.

method.name: register_persona
method.description: Register a persona with the belief manager.

method.name: unregister_persona
method.description: Unregister a persona from the belief manager.
